imdb.plot outline: "The Elephant in the Room" tackles issues each week that people are afraid to speak of, such as little people , racism and eating disorders. Host Jasmine Bowen dives into the issues with special guests stars to give voices to those normally silent.
imdb.title: The Elephant in the Room
plot: "_The Elephant in the Room_ (qv)" tackles issues each week that people are afraid to speak of, such as little people , racism and eating disorders. Host Jasmine Bowen dives into the issues with special guests stars to give voices to those normally silent.::Anonymous.
